forum.content: The pain never goes away,but it gets better everyday. I'm trying to turn life around , start back again from the ground .And as long as you're down I know I just need to make it past right now . look at you day after day  just to see that smile upon your face .  Everything I do it for you.  Can you tell me what to do when all the feelings gone? When you look around you're all alone  because right went to wrong . Tell me how you look into my face and say I can't stay what do you do when love fades away?
forum.title: 失戀
